arts.sum: The most-bought forward of the round registered his first Premier League hat-trick and his best EVER return in Fantasy with a 17-point haul in Newcastle United's 4-0 win at Ipswich Town . And with the most-recruited defender of the round, Antonee Robinson (£4.8m), set to play on Sunday, Gabriel (£6.2m) continued a good day for the men at the back with an assist in Arsenal's 5-1 win at Crystal Palace .

arts.ttl: £15m player really wants Newcastle to make a bid for him in January – journalist
arts.sum: The January transfer window is almost upon us and Newcastle are one of the teams who may want to be busy next month. Indeed, Newcastle’s...

arts.ttl: George Eastham obituary: One of England's boys of 1966 who ended football 'slavery' - today's players owe a debt of gratitude to former Arsenal, Newcastle and Stoke star
arts.sum: Eastham will forever be associated with magic but it says everything about his remarkable career that winning the World Cup and League Cup are not his most important achievements.
Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe says he is "delighted" after his side thrash Ipswich 4-0 away from home.

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak celebrates first Newcastle hat-trick with tribute to team-mate
arts.sum: Newcastle thrashed Ipswich Town 4-0 to head into Christmas on a high and it was an extra special afternoon for Alexander Isak, who headed back up north with the matchball

arts.ttl: Isak scores after 25 seconds but it's not fastest goal of the season
arts.sum: It took Alexander Isak on 25.95 seconds to score from kick-off in Newcastle United ’s match at Ipswich Town and it wasn’t even the fastest goal of the season so far. Yoane Wissa holds the mark as scorer of the fastest goal this season, striking after only 22 seconds at Manchester City in September.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe laughs at question on Alexander Isak future & drops Newcastle United contract hint
arts.sum: Newcastle United boss Eddie Howe is confident that Alexander Isak will sign a new contract at St James' Park - when the time is right. Howe then became involved in a series of questions on whether Isak had indeed been in contract talks and if they'd stalled or not, adding: "I don't think contract talks started.

arts.ttl: Newcastle defeat 'a lesson' for Ipswich - McKenna
arts.sum: Newcastle defeat 'a lesson' for Ipswich - McKenna

arts.ttl: ‘Worth £70m’… Newcastle fans hail player who shone alongside Alexander Isak in win at Ipswich
arts.sum: Newcastle United have recorded two consecutive 4-0 wins in the Premier League after hammering Ipswich Town on Saturday. The Magpies, who thrashed Leicester City 4-0...

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak's perfect tribute to Sir Bobby as Ipswich fans show class to Newcastle United star
arts.sum: Well, Newcastle, attacking the Sir Bobby Robson Stand, started the game in a lively manner and made a breakthrough after just 25 seconds as Jacob Murphy's cross ended up at the feet of Alexander Isak. The second half saw Newcastle go in search of more goals with Bruno's header hitting the post after Lewis Hall's cross on 51 minutes.
